channel.title: CVE Feed for Awsm Innovations -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Awsm Innovations -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-23707|2023-03-23T16:12:13.931Z -- awsm%20innovations -- embed%20any%20document%20%E2%80%93%20embed%20pdf%2C%20word%2C%20powerpoint%20and%20excel%20files
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting'), Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type vulnerability in Awsm Innovations Embed Any Document – Embed PDF, Word, PowerPoint and Excel Files allows Stored XSS via upload of SVG and HTML files. This issue affects Embed Any Document – Embed PDF, Word, PowerPoint and Excel Files plugin <= 2.7.1 versions.
